channel.title: Walking NPCs?
channel.description:
My autospawn.cfg looks like this:
[code]spawn = 1200 3252 3424 0 0 0 0 0 1 VarrockEastGuard1 spawn = 1200 3255 3424 0 0 0 0 0 1 VarrockEastGuard2 spawn = 53 2455 3249 0 0 0 0 0 2 DragonsGateGuardian1 spawn = 53 2453 3243 0 0 0 0 0 2 DragonsGateGuardian2 spawn = 54 2453 3236 0 0 0 0 0 2 DragonsGateGuardian2 spawn = 51 2475 3242 0 0 0 0 0 2 BabyDragon1 spawn = 51 2474 3251 0 0 0 0 0 2 BabyDragon2 spawn = 51 2468 3248 0 0 0 0 0 2 BabyDragon3 spawn = 51 2468 3243 0 0 0 0 0 2 BabyDragon4 spawn = 51 2471 3239 0 0 0 0 0 2 BabyDragon5 spawn = 51 2469 3245 0 0 0 0 0 2 BabyDragon6 spawn = 51 2459 3249 0 0 0 0 0 2 BabyDragon7 spawn = 51 2474 3253 0 0 0 0 0 2 BabyDragon8 spawn = 51 2470 3253 0 0 0 0 0 2 BabyDragon9 spawn = 51 2478 3244 0 0 0 0 0 2 BabyDragon10 spawn = 51 2481 3248 0 0 0 0 0 2 BabyDragon11 spawn = 51 2476 3240 0 0 0 0 0 2 BabyDragon12 spawn = 51 2473 3247 0 0 0 0 0 2 BabyDragon13 spawn = 47 2463 3184 0 0 0 0 0 2 Rat1 spawn = 47 2465 3185 0 0 0 0 0 2 Rat2 spawn = 47 2462 3178 0 0 0 0 0 2 Rat3 spawn = 47 2461 3175 0 0 0 0 0 2 Rat4 spawn = 47 2459 3175 0 0 0 0 0 2 Rat5 spawn = 87 2467 3185 0 0 0 0 0 2 BigRat1 spawn = 87 2470 3182 0 0 0 0 0 2 BigRat2 spawn = 87 2458 3183 0 0 0 0 0 2 BigRat3 spawn = 87 2462 3179 0 0 0 0 0 2 BigRat4 spawn = 87 2467 3175 0 0 0 0 0 2 BigRat5 spawn = 87 2472 3177 0 0 0 0 0 2 BigRat6 spawn = 87 2464 3172 0 0 0 0 0 2 BigRat7 spawn = 1 2465 3181 0 0 0 0 0 1 ScreamingMan1 spawn = 1 2468 3174 0 0 0 0 0 1 ScreamingMan2 spawn = 6 2460 3181 0 0 0 0 0 1 ScreamingLady[/code]
but, isnt 2 supposed to make them walk, and 1 make them stationary?

item.title: Walking NPCs?
item.dc:creator: @z4mor4k_m1n1on z4mor4k m1n1on
item.description:
@z4mor4k_m1n1on wrote:

ok spawn = 87 2467 3185 0 0 0 0 0 2 BigRat1 the first 0 is where they walk upwards the2nd is where they walk to the right the 3rd is where they walk down and the 4th is usualy the first one so if i didspawn = 87 2467 3185 2468 3186 3185 2467 0 2 BigRat1 ok hed walk up 1 to 2468, hed walk over one space to 3186, then down one to 3185 then back to 2467 and start it over again
